author: Mahita Gajanan
title: Blue Ivy Pays Tribute to Prince With Grammys Outfit

organizations.name: blue ivy pays tribute to prince with grammys outfit blue ivy carter

text:
Blue Ivy Carter stole the show at the 2017 Grammys with an outfit that payed tribute to late musical icon Prince .
Wearing a pink suit with a ruffled collar shirt similar to looks Prince wore while performing, Blue Ivy sat on her father Jay-Zâ€™s lap during the awards show. Her mother BeyoncÃ©, who is up for nine nominations this year, performed at the Grammys.
Blue Ivy paying tribute to Prince at the #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/yrIkYRJueU

The Grammys will honor Prince , who died last year, during the ceremony.
